content: for editors wondering why all these are coming up: I've been just fixing these things manually in the past. But with so many IGs being published, I just can't now, and the EC wants me to get to the point where HQ can do the publishing. That seems far off right now, but that's why I'm being much more proactive about that
..more on this: I've updated the code that builds qa.html to add a little section at the top addressing ballot readiness. Please review this section and address issues it identifies
Thanks @Grahame Grieve - that section is super helpful. Have fixed all HAI issues.
